item.title: About us - Tourism
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
[vc_row][vc_column][volcanno_single_image reveal="true" image="33"][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column][volcanno_heading title="Leading Tourism Consulting Company Focused on Sustainable Tourism" subtitle="COMPANY OVERVIEW"][vc_column_text]ConsultingPress is a leading tourism consulting company with over 15 years of experience in tourism strategic planning, tourism marketing and development. ConsultingPress has built it’s expertise on high-skilled tourism consulting specialists, each in their own field of tourism niche.
Our main focus is sustainable tourism and how it can help local economy while preserving natural and cultural heritage. Our team of experts has wide experience in fields of cultural heritage marketing, tourism strategic planning, destination marketing and assessment and environmental influence research.
Here in ConsultingPress we offer our clients support in destination marketing, promoting unique story each destination has and inspiring travellers to visit that destination. Our wide set of tourism consulting services helps our clients in gaining economy boost, cultural heritage promotion and destination promotion, while keeping environment intact.[/vc_column_text][volcanno_feature_box style="feature-box" title="Our mission" text="Helping local businesses create efficient, successful and sustainable tourism business by destination assessment, development, management and marketing."][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column width="1/2"][volcanno_heading heading_style="custom-heading-03" title="Why are we different?" item.content:encoded: [vc_row css=".vc_custom_1482400677031{margin-bottom: 30px !important;}"][vc_column][volcanno_single_image reveal="true" image="554"][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column][volcanno_heading title="Company history" subtitle="About"][vc_column_text]ConsultingPress is 15 years in management consulting business, started by two enthusiasts it grew to team of 20 high-skilled management consulting specialists. Here is how we started.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column][volcanno_company_timeline item.title: Accordion
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
[vc_row][vc_column][volcanno_heading heading_style="custom-heading-02" title="Accordion Default Style" subtitle="SIMPLE ACCORDION FOR YOUR PAGES"][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column width="1/2"][vc_tta_accordion style="consulting-press-default" color="" active_section="1"][vc_tta_section title="What do you do in ConsultingPress?" tab_id="1477391280657-4ba7f951-bdca"][vc_column_text]
We are leading tourism consulting company oriented on sustainable tourism development, management and marketing. We have high-skilled tourism consultants and partners among travel agencies and independent consultants.
[/vc_column_text][/vc_tta_section][vc_tta_section title="Why sustainable tourism?" tab_id="1477391280692-04b41938-d83c"][vc_column_text]
First let's talk about sustainable tourism meaning. Sustainable tourism doesn't mean only eco-friendly or green tourism. It's much more than that. Investing in sustainable tourism you are developing environmental, economic and socio-cultural aspect of your tourism destination. Sustainable tourism helps in preserving cultural heritage, natural resources and helps in economy growth.
[/vc_column_text][/vc_tta_section][vc_tta_section title="What areas of tourism you cover?" tab_id="1480088985228-82abf3c6-6c15"][vc_column_text]
Here in ConsultingPress we are focused on five main areas of tourism consulting. That is tourism development, strategic planning, tourism marketing and training and education in sustainable tourism management and development.
[/vc_column_text][/vc_tta_section][vc_tta_section title="How can I join ConsultingPress Team?" tab_id="1480089011952-87c6e13b-cf11"][vc_column_text]
You are sustainable tourism expert or want to become one of them? Then please submit your CV and cover letter through job application for on our careers page as we are always looking for fresh talent to join our team.
[/vc_column_text][/vc_tta_section][/vc_tta_accordion][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/2"][vc_tta_accordion style="consulting-press-default" color="#071740" active_section="1"][vc_tta_section title="What do you do in ConsultingPress?" tab_id="1483617178481-2f70a611-fb5e"][vc_column_text]
We are leading tourism consulting company oriented on sustainable tourism development, management and marketing. We have high-skilled tourism consultants and partners among travel agencies and independent consultants.
[/vc_column_text][/vc_tta_section][vc_tta_section title="Why sustainable tourism?" tab_id="1483617178567-e3cfebc0-e43b"][vc_column_text]
First let's talk about sustainable tourism meaning. Sustainable tourism doesn't mean only eco-friendly or green tourism. It's much more than that. Investing in sustainable tourism you are developing environmental, economic and socio-cultural aspect of your tourism destination. Sustainable tourism helps in preserving cultural heritage, natural resources and helps in economy growth.
[/vc_column_text][/vc_tta_section][vc_tta_section title="What areas of tourism you cover?" tab_id="1483617178651-dbe48220-a388"][vc_column_text]
Here in ConsultingPress we are focused on five main areas of tourism consulting. That is tourism development, strategic planning, tourism marketing and training and education in sustainable tourism management and development.
[/vc_column_text][/vc_tta_section][vc_tta_section title="How can I join ConsultingPress Team?" tab_id="1483617178743-ade7a1b1-9799"][vc_column_text]
You are sustainable tourism expert or want to become one of them? Then please submit your CV and cover letter through job application for on our careers page as we are always looking for fresh talent to join our team.
[/vc_column_text][/vc_tta_section][/vc_tta_accordion][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column][volcanno_heading heading_style="custom-heading-02" title="Accordion Boxed Style" subtitle="ACCORDION BOXED STYLE, USED ON FAQ PAGE"][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column width="1/2"][vc_tta_accordion style="consulting-press-boxed" color="" active_section="1"][vc_tta_section title="What Tourism Development Process Involves?" tab_id="1477391365631-111b0fd4-196f"][vc_column_text]
Tourism development process involves couple of inner processes. Those are destination management, workforce development, tourism product development and measurement of tourism impact.
[/vc_column_text][/vc_tta_section][vc_tta_section title="What Strategic Planning Process Involves?" tab_id="1477391365704-2e3fe252-4c9c"][vc_column_text]
Strategic planning involves couple of processes and activities like tourism destination assessment, tourism business planning, creating tourism master plan and tourism marketing strategies.
[/vc_column_text][/vc_tta_section][vc_tta_section title="What is Destination Assessment?" tab_id="1480089281821-684fb275-f67c"][vc_column_text]
By tourism destination assessment we aim to find out what are current destination issues and what are it's key values for visitors. Destination assessment leads to defining custom strategic plan for tourism destination development and marketing.
[/vc_column_text][/vc_tta_section][/vc_tta_accordion][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/2"][vc_tta_accordion style="consulting-press-boxed" color="#071740" active_section="1"][vc_tta_section title="What Tourism Development Process Involves?" tab_id="1483617287304-cc5d6ccd-6814"][vc_column_text]
Tourism development process involves couple of inner processes. Those are destination management, workforce development, tourism product development and measurement of tourism impact.
[/vc_column_text][/vc_tta_section][vc_tta_section title="What Strategic Planning Process Involves?" tab_id="1483617287401-7def4c45-131c"][vc_column_text]
Strategic planning involves couple of processes and activities like tourism destination assessment, tourism business planning, creating tourism master plan and tourism marketing strategies.
[/vc_column_text][/vc_tta_section][vc_tta_section title="What is Destination Assessment?" tab_id="1483617287485-94e655b8-0598"][vc_column_text]
By tourism destination assessment we aim to find out what are current destination issues and what are it's key values for visitors. Destination assessment leads to defining custom strategic plan for tourism destination development and marketing.
[/vc_column_text][/vc_tta_section][/vc_tta_accordion][/vc_column][/vc_row]

item.title: Job listing
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
[vc_row][vc_column][volcanno_nivo_slider slide_group="%5B%7B%22image%22%3A%22586%22%2C%22caption%22%3A%22I%20am%20very%20enthusiastic%20about%20my%20work%2C%20mainly%20because%20I%20work%20in%20creative%20and%20positive%20environment%20with%20some%20amazing%20people.%22%2C%22subtext%22%3A%22Ashley%20Valdez%2C%20Online%20Marketing%22%2C%22subtext_color%22%3A%22%236ec25b%22%7D%2C%7B%22image%22%3A%22588%22%2C%22caption%22%3A%22I've%20learned%20a%20lot%20in%20these%20few%20years%20in%20ConsultingPress.%20Among%20all%2C%20the%20of%20sustainable%20tourism.%22%2C%22subtext%22%3A%22Patrick%20Murray%2C%20Principal%22%2C%22subtext_color%22%3A%22%236ec25b%22%7D%2C%7B%22image%22%3A%22587%22%2C%22caption%22%3A%22Working%20in%20ConsultingPress%20is%20great.%20It's%20all%20about%20team%20effort.%22%2C%22subtext%22%3A%22Brandon%20Lucas%2C%20Marketing%20Specialist%22%2C%22subtext_color%22%3A%22%236ec25b%22%7D%5D" width="750" height="396" title_size="nivo-slider-01"][volcanno_heading heading_style="custom-heading-03" title="Work for ConsultingPress"][vc_column_text]Here at ConsultingPress, we are always looking for fresh talents. ConsultingPress is a leading tourism consulting company with offices around the world. Our team is comprised of high-skilled tourism consultants including strategic planning consultants, tourism marketing consultants, tourism development consultants and sustainable tourism experts. If you have passion for all things tourism related and understand sustainable tourism you might be the perfect person for us. We work with interns, volunteers and consultants around the world, so no matter where you are from, we might have a job opportunity just for you.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column width="1/2"][vc_video link="https://vimeo.com/144656411?color=ff5500"][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/2"][volcanno_heading heading_style="custom-heading-03" title="Who are we looking for" title_size="h3"][vc_column_text]We always look for creative and enthusiastic people to join our team. You simply must be passionate about your job and everything else will come along. You can check available job positions, or open an open letter. We are looking forward to meeting you![/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column][volcanno_heading heading_style="custom-heading-03" title="Opened job positions" title_size="h3"][volcanno_table]
Job Title Location Department End date
Consultant London, UK Planning Nov 20, 2016
Markting Specialist London, UK Online marketing Nov 20, 2016
Intern London, UK Human Resources Nov 20, 2016
[/volcanno_table][/vc_column][/vc_row]

item.title: FAQ
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded: [vc_row][vc_column][volcanno_heading heading_style="custom-heading-03" title="Frequently Asked Questions" title_size="h3"][vc_column_text]Here a re a list of some frequently asked questions by our clients. if you don’t find the answer you seek, please feel free to contact us.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column][vc_tta_accordion style="consulting-press-boxed" color="" active_section="1"][vc_tta_section title="What do you do in ConsultingPress?" tab_id="1479380572185-7af5bf78-e0b7"][vc_column_text]We are leading tourism consulting company oriented on sustainable tourism development, management and marketing. We have high-skilled tourism consultants and partners among travel agencies and independent consultants.[/vc_column_text][/vc_tta_section][vc_tta_section title="Why sustainable tourism?" tab_id="1479380572204-6e0cbeb5-490f"][vc_column_text]First let's talk about sustainable tourism meaning. Sustainable tourism doesn't mean only eco-friendly or green tourism. It's much more than that. Investing in sustainable tourism you are developing environmental, economic and socio-cultural aspect of your tourism destination. Sustainable tourism helps in preserving cultural heritage, natural resources and helps in economy growth.[/vc_column_text][/vc_tta_section][vc_tta_section title="What areas of tourism you cover?" tab_id="1479380659146-4e0c8786-3c2c"][vc_column_text]Here in ConsultingPress we are focused on five main areas of tourism consulting. That is tourism development, strategic planning, tourism marketing and training and education in sustainable tourism management and development.[/vc_column_text][/vc_tta_section][vc_tta_section title="How can I join ConsultingPress Team?" tab_id="1480073062948-598a9de0-4e24"][vc_column_text]You are sustainable tourism expert or want to become one of them? Then please submit your CV and cover letter through job application for on our careers page as we are always looking for fresh talent to join our team.[/vc_column_text][/vc_tta_section][vc_tta_section title="What Tourism Development Process Involves?" tab_id="1480073128886-e040c4f5-fdef"][vc_column_text]Tourism development process involves couple of inner processes. Those are destination management, workforce development, tourism product development and measurement of tourism impact.[/vc_column_text][/vc_tta_section][vc_tta_section title="What Strategic Planning Process Involves?" tab_id="1480073178444-b7d6e6c6-b6ed"][vc_column_text]Strategic planning involves couple of processes and activities like tourism destination assessment, tourism business planning, creating tourism master plan and tourism marketing strategies.[/vc_column_text][/vc_tta_section][vc_tta_section title="What is Destination Assessment?" tab_id="1480073219063-003de716-a915"][vc_column_text]By tourism destination assessment we aim to find out what are current destination issues and what are it's key values for visitors. Destination assessment leads to defining custom strategic plan for tourism destination development and marketing.[/vc_column_text][/vc_tta_section][vc_tta_section title="Why is tourism marketing important?" tab_id="1480073245648-cfad80ed-e87d"][vc_column_text]Marketing is always one of the most important parts of any business or product. By investing in destination marketing you are increasing acknowledgement of your cultural goods, natural resources and increase the value of your tourism business and products.[/vc_column_text][/vc_tta_section][/vc_tta_accordion][/vc_column][/vc_row]

item.title: Typography
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
[vc_row css=".vc_custom_1483000811368{margin-bottom: 30px !important;}"][vc_column][vc_column_text]

h1 Heading

This is example of standard h2 heading. The best practice for SEO purposes is to have one h1 heading on your page. For example you can use it on your page title, like we did in this template.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row css=".vc_custom_1483000816666{margin-bottom: 30px !important;}"][vc_column][vc_column_text]

h2 Heading

This is example of standard h2 heading. It is used for all major headings on your page. For example the page name is Services. This will be h1 heading. After that you have specific service called "Consulting". This will be h2 heading.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row css=".vc_custom_1483000821578{margin-bottom: 30px !important;}"][vc_column][vc_column_text]

h3 Heading

This is example of h3 heading. According to our previous heading standard, on services page you have main service called "Consulting". Then of course you have different fields of consulting, like "Tourism Consulting". That will be heading h3.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row css=".vc_custom_1483000830057{margin-bottom: 30px !important;}"][vc_column][vc_column_text]

h4 Heading

This is example of standard h4 heading. It is used for less important headlines. The basic rule is to follow hierarchy. So for example you have service "Tourism Consulting", like we mentioned previously. If you have different services for that main service and you are showing them on that same page, the heading of that services should be h4.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row css=".vc_custom_1483000834726{margin-bottom: 30px !important;}"][vc_column][vc_column_text]
h5 Heading
This is example of standard h5 heading. It is used for some small elements on the page, less important elements. Where you will use it will depend on structure of your page and how many main sections and subsections you have.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column][vc_column_text]
h6 Heading
This is example of standard h6 heading. It is used for some small elements on the page, less important elements. Where you will use it will depend on structure of your page and how many main sections and subsections you have.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column][volcanno_divider divider_style="divider"][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column][volcanno_heading title="Custom heading style 01" subtitle="CUSTOM HEADINGS"][vc_column_text]This is example of custom heading style 01. It has small title on the top and main title on the bottom. Perfect for showcasing small amount of content. It is left aligned and fits perfectly on any page.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column][volcanno_heading heading_style="custom-heading-02" title="Center aligned custom heading" subtitle="CUSTOM HEADINGS"][vc_column_text]This is example of custom heading style 02. It is center aligned, title is in focus on first place, and you also have subtitle where you can describe what that section is about. It can be only two words, or maybe two sentences.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column][volcanno_heading heading_style="custom-heading-03" title="Custom heading style 03"][vc_column_text]This is example of custom heading style 02. It is center aligned, title is in focus on first place, and you also have subtitle where you can describe what that section is about. It can be only two words, or maybe two sentences.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column][volcanno_divider divider_style="divider"][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column][vc_column_text]

Blockquote

This is example of a blockquote. You can use it for your company mission and vision statement or on a page showcasing some authors quote.[/vc_column_text][volcanno_blockquote author="- ColorByt"]"I always love when you upload something new. Your attention to detail, uniqueness and story driven design is a joy to explore. Every pixel is there for a reason, nothing is generic, and it all works great together. Truly an inspiration to look p to, and steal from."[/volcanno_blockquote][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column][volcanno_divider divider_style="divider"][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column][vc_column_text]

Text element

This is simple p tag. Here we will show you different styling for text element you can use. For example this is bold text. There is sometimes a need to color the text. We did it in theme colors. This is how it looks. You may have a need to color the background of the text, that is to highlight something important. This is highlighted text.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column][vc_column_text]

Code element

This is one of the standard HTML elements.[/vc_column_text][volcanno_raw_code code="alF1ZXJ5JTI4ZG9jdW1lbnQlMjkucmVhZHklMjhmdW5jdGlvbiUyMCUyOCUyNCUyOSUyMCU3QiUwQSUyMCUyMCUyMCUyMCUyN3VzZSUyMHN0cmljdCUyNyUzQiUwQSUyMCUyMCUyMCUyMCUyRiUyRiUyMFlvdXIlMjBjb2RlJTIwZ29lcyUyMGhlcmUlMEElN0QlMjklM0IlMjAlMjA="][/vc_column][/vc_row]

item.title: Dividers
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
[vc_row css=".vc_custom_1482824941562{margin-bottom: 80px !important;}"][vc_column][vc_column_text css=".vc_custom_1482824910604{margin-bottom: 80px !important;}"]
Custom dots divider
This is example of custom divider in shape of three dots. It is perfect for dividing your content in a beautiful way. Perfect to use on home and intro pages as it adds some custom, unique feel to your page. It's clean and simple, yet it divides your content in nice way and adds a bit of designers touch to the site. Of course we made some other, simpler dividers you can use on any of your pages. To use a divider, simply add it in a row and full width column inside that row. To use this type of divider just use class "divider".[/vc_column_text][volcanno_divider divider_style="divider"][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row css=".vc_custom_1482825384714{margin-bottom: 80px !important;}"][vc_column][vc_column_text css=".vc_custom_1482825393079{margin-bottom: 110px !important;}"]
Simple Line divider
This is example of a simple line divider that divides rows of your content. You can use it on any of your pages, home page or inner pages. To use it, add it in a single row, full width column. Inside of it place a divider element, style line. SImple![/vc_column_text][volcanno_divider divider_style="divider-line"][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row css=".vc_custom_1482825435126{margin-bottom: 80px !important;}"][vc_column][vc_column_text css=".vc_custom_1482825404905{margin-bottom: 110px !important;}"]
Divider dotted
This is example of a simple dotted divider that divides rows of your content. You can use it on any of your pages, home page or inner pages. To use it, add it in a single row, full width column. Inside of it place a div with class "divider-dotted".[/vc_column_text][volcanno_divider divider_style="divider-dotted"][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row css=".vc_custom_1482825445460{margin-bottom: 80px !important;}"][vc_column][vc_column_text css=".vc_custom_1482825415002{margin-bottom: 110px !important;}"]
Custom icon divider
You can use any of the FontAwesome or Lynny Icons Font icons in this divider. You can use it on any of your pages, home page or inner pages. To use it, add it in a single row, full width column.[/vc_column_text][volcanno_divider divider_style="divider-icon" icon_type="icon_lynny" icon_lynny="lynny-building-2" design_param=".vc_custom_1483001615890{margin-top: 15px !important;}"][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row css=".vc_custom_1482826288333{margin-bottom: 120px !important;}"][vc_column][vc_column_text css=".vc_custom_1482825422816{margin-bottom: 110px !important;}"]
To top divider
This is example of to top icon. Normally it is already included in ConsultingPress. You can see it when scrolling down. It appears on the right bottom side of the page. However you may need this element on specific position or specific page, so we decided to include it.[/vc_column_text][volcanno_divider divider_style="divider-scroll-up"][/vc_column][/vc_row]

item.title: Pricing tables
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
[vc_row][vc_column][volcanno_heading heading_style="custom-heading-02" title="Pricing Tables Design" subtitle="SIMPLE PRICING TABLES"][vc_column_text]

It's well known that most consulting companies do not charge fixed fees. The pricing is based on project basis. However, there could be a need for featuring some kind of prices, like paid seminars or case studies, so we decided to include this element in ConsultingPress.

item.title: Our team
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
[vc_row][vc_column][volcanno_team_member href="url:http%3A%2F%2Fdemo.pixel-industry.com%2Fconsultingpress%2Fhome-tourism%2Four-team%2Fteam-member-page%2F|||" image="559" title="CEO & FOUNDER" name="Joshua Turner" bio=""]Joshua is CEO and founder of ConsultingPress.
Joshua has been in tourism business for over 20 years. After working in travel agency for five years, Joshua recognized the need for tourism consultants and decided to grow his experience in that direction.[/volcanno_team_member][volcanno_team_member href="url:http%3A%2F%2Fdemo.pixel-industry.com%2Fconsultingpress%2Fhome-tourism%2Four-team%2Fteam-member-page-patrick%2F|||" image="565" title="PRINCIPAL" name="Patrick Murray" bio=""]Patrick has 15 years of experience in tourism consulting with major expertise in strategic planning and tourism development. Prior to becoming a principal in ConsultingPress, Patrick worked in Trucking Ltd governing tourism transfers for global vacation home rentals companies. Patrick joined ConsultingPress in 2004.[/volcanno_team_member][volcanno_team_member href="url:http%3A%2F%2Fdemo.pixel-industry.com%2Fconsultingpress%2Fhome-tourism%2Four-team%2Fteam-member-page-ashley%2F|||" image="1065" title="TOURISM CONSULTANT" name="Ashley Valdez" bio=""]Ashley Valdez is tourism consultant specialist with expertise in destination management and assessment. Ashley has 10 years of experience in travel and tourism consulting. Ashley joined ConsultingPress in 2009. and since then has been working on destination assessment, tourism master plans and marketing strategies.[/volcanno_team_member][volcanno_team_member href="url:http%3A%2F%2Fdemo.pixel-industry.com%2Fconsultingpress%2Fhome-tourism%2Four-team%2Fteam-member-brandon-lucas%2F|||" image="1069" title="MARKETING SPECIALIST" name="Brandon Lucas" bio=""]Brandon Lucas is specialist in online marketing for adventure travel destinations, specially small vacation rental companies. Brandon joined ConsultingPress in 2005. and since then has been working with clients from three different continents. He is marketing specialist with wide experience in marketing sustainable tourism.[/volcanno_team_member][/vc_column][/vc_row]

After working in travel agency for five years, Joshua recognized the need for tourism consultants and decided to grow his experience in that direction.
Joshua has a wide range of expertise in tourism development and marketing. He has been working on international projects where he conducted destination assessment, tourism strategic planning, destination management, workforce development and tourism impacts measurement.
Joshua is sustainable tourism enthusiastic, helping local businesses recognise value of sustainable tourism, it’s positive impact on local and global economy while in the same time conserving nature and cultural heritage.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column width="1/2"][volcanno_heading heading_style="custom-heading-03" title="Education & Experience"][volcanno_icon_list Prior to becoming a principal in ConsultingPress, Ashley worked in Trucking Ltd governing tourism transfers for global vacation home rentals companies. Ashley joined ConsultingPress in 2004.
Ashley has a wide range of expertise in tourism development and marketing. He has been working on international projects where he conducted destination assessment, tourism strategic planning, destination management, workforce development and tourism impacts measurement.
Ashley is sustainable tourism enthusiastic, helping local businesses recognise value of sustainable tourism, it’s positive impact on local and global economy while in the same time conserving nature and cultural heritage.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column width="1/2"][volcanno_heading heading_style="custom-heading-03" title="Education & Experience"][volcanno_icon_list Holidayz Travel

Holidayz Travel is one of the biggest Travel agencies in Thailand. They have been our partners for seven years. For more information visit holidayztravel.com.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row css=".vc_custom_1483519075223{margin-bottom: 30px !important;}"][vc_column width="1/3"][volcanno_single_image image="621"][/vc_column][vc_column width="2/3"][vc_column_text]

For more information visit traveldeals.com[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row css=".vc_custom_1483519083132{margin-bottom: 30px !important;}"][vc_column width="1/3"][volcanno_single_image image="2032"][/vc_column][vc_column width="2/3"][vc_column_text]

item.title: Pricing
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
[vc_row][vc_column][volcanno_heading heading_style="custom-heading-02" title="Tourism consulting services" subtitle="PRICING"][vc_column_text]

It's well known that most consulting companies do not charge fixed fees. The pricing is based on project basis. However, there could be a need for featuring some kind of prices, like paid seminars or case studies, so we decided to include this element in ConsultingPress.

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner width="1/3"][volcanno_pricing_table title="Basic" price=" {$4000} / project" features_group="%5B%7B%22text%22%3A%22Basic%20tourism%20business%20consulting%22%7D%2C%7B%22text%22%3A%22Basic%20consulting%20about%20starting%20tourism%20business%22%7D%2C%7B%22text%22%3A%22Cca%205%20days%20project%20duration%22%7D%2C%7B%22text%22%3A%22For%20small%20business%20owners%22%7D%5D" button_href="url:http%3A%2F%2Fdemo.pixel-industry.com%2Fconsultingpress%2Fhome-tourism%2Fcontact-compact%2F|||"][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width="1/3"][volcanno_pricing_table table_style="active" title="Standard" price="{$8000} / project" features_group="%5B%7B%22text%22%3A%22Tourism%20business%20consulting%22%7D%2C%7B%22text%22%3A%22Standard%20consulting%20about%20starting%20tourism%20business%22%7D%2C%7B%22text%22%3A%22Cca%2012%20days%20project%20duration%22%7D%2C%7B%22text%22%3A%22For%20medium%20business%20owners%22%7D%5D" button_href="url:http%3A%2F%2Fdemo.pixel-industry.com%2Fconsultingpress%2Fhome-tourism%2Fcontact-compact%2F|||"][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width="1/3"][volcanno_pricing_table title="Professional" price="{$12000} / project" features_group="%5B%7B%22text%22%3A%22Complete%20Tourism%20business%20consulting%22%7D%2C%7B%22text%22%3A%22Consulting%20about%20starting%20tourism%20business%22%7D%2C%7B%22text%22%3A%22Cca%2030%20days%20project%20duration%22%7D%2C%7B%22text%22%3A%22For%20large%20business%20owners%22%7D%5D" button_href="url:http%3A%2F%2Fdemo.pixel-industry.com%2Fconsultingpress%2Fhome-tourism%2Fcontact-compact%2F|||"][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][/vc_row]

item.content:encoded:
[vc_row css=".vc_custom_1483521618942{margin-bottom: 30px !important;}"][vc_column][volcanno_single_image reveal="true" image="2096"][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row css=".vc_custom_1483521640733{margin-bottom: 80px !important;}"][vc_column][volcanno_heading title="Tourism development" subtitle="WHAT WE DO"][vc_column_text]Tourism is one of the largest and fastest growing industries in the world. It plays a vital role in smaller and less developed countries as it creates business opportunities and have positive impact on economy and life of local people.
Here at ConsultingPress we consider sustainable tourism a powerful tool that optimises natural, economical and social aspect of tourism. That's why we are focused to sustainable tourism development, that creates positive experiences for both local people and travellers.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row css=".vc_custom_1483521662258{margin-bottom: 80px !important;}"][vc_column width="1/2"][volcanno_heading heading_style="custom-heading-03" title="Why sustainable tourism?" title_size="h3"][vc_column_text]First let's talk about sustainable tourism meaning. Sustainable tourism doesn't mean only eco-friendly or green tourism. It's much more than that. Investing in sustainable tourism you are developing environmental, economic and socio-cultural aspect of your tourism destination. Sustainable tourism helps in preserving cultural heritage, natural resources and helps in economy growth.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/2"][volcanno_single_image image="2099"][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row css=".vc_custom_1483521671955{margin-bottom: 80px !important;}"][vc_column][volcanno_heading heading_style="custom-heading-03" title="Tourism Development areas we cover" title_size="h3"][volcanno_icon_list list_style="detailed" [vc_row][vc_column][volcanno_single_image reveal="true" image="2145"][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column][volcanno_heading title="Tourism Partnership" subtitle="What we do"][vc_column_text]ConsultingPress brings local governments, tourism experts, tourism agencies and small business together. With smart connections you will increase benefits of tourism development.
By connecting different entities, value of tourism services provided is increased for the visitor as for the provider. Connecting small local tourism businesses with travel agencies helps in promoting destinations, increased sales and jobs.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column][volcanno_heading heading_style="custom-heading-03" title="Activities and results:" title_size="h3"][volcanno_icon_list list_style="detailed" param_group_detailed="%5B%7B%22icon_type%22%3A%22icon_lynny%22%2C%22icon_lynny%22%3A%22lynny-checkmark-2%22%2C%22title%22%3A%22Travel%20Agencies%20Cooperation%22%2C%22text%22%3A%22Cooperation%20with%20tourism%20agencies%20on%20global%20scale%20helps%20in%20promoting%20destination.%22%7D%2C%7B%22icon_type%22%3A%22icon_lynny%22%2C%22icon_lynny%22%3A%22lynny-checkmark-2%22%2C%22title%22%3A%22Global%20Tourism%20Connection%20Program%22%2C%22text%22%3A%22Connecting%20local%20government%2C%20local%20tourism%20business%20owners%20and%20global%20tourism%20agencies%20and%20organizations%20helps%20in%20destination%20marketing%2C%20attracting%20visitors%20and%20raising%20of%20destination%20awareness%20on%20global%20scale.%22%7D%2C%7B%22icon_type%22%3A%22icon_lynny%22%2C%22icon_lynny%22%3A%22lynny-checkmark-2%22%2C%22title%22%3A%22Marketing%20Partnership%20Programs%22%2C%22text%22%3A%22ConsultingPress%20connects%20local%20businesses%20with%20global%20tourism%20marketing%20agencies%20for%20better%20promoting%20cultural%20and%20environmental%20aspects%20of%20destination%2C%20which%20leads%20to%20increase%20of%20numbers%20of%20visitors%20and%20awareness%20of%20destination%20natural%20environment%22%7D%5D"][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column][volcanno_divider divider_style="divider"][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column][volcanno_call_to_action cta_text="Get in touch with our tourism consultants today" text="Contact us" href="url:google.com|||" icon="true" icon_type="icon_lynny" icon_lynny="lynny-arrow-circle-right"][/vc_column][/vc_row]

item.title: Services Tourism Seminars
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
[vc_row][vc_column][volcanno_single_image image="2154"][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column][volcanno_heading title="Tourism Seminars" subtitle="What we do"][vc_column_text]Learn more about value of sustainable tourism and it's impact on local economy and environment. ConsultingPress organises high quality tourism development and management case studies, seminars and workshops.
Our experts in sustainable tourism development and management will provide you with valuable information on sustainable tourism development and management.
ConsultingPress occasional organises tourism marketing workshops where you can learn best practices in tourism marketing on real case studies we conducted for our past clients. You can learn about difficulties in tourism marketing and how to achieve maximum results from your marketing efforts.
Learn more about destination management as one of the most important parts of tourism development, steps it involves and crucial activities that needs to be made for achieving best results. You can learn more about our seminars and workshops on our company events page.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column][volcanno_divider divider_style="divider"][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column][volcanno_call_to_action cta_text="Learn about upcoming seminars and events" text="Explore events" href="url:http%3A%2F%2Fdemo.pixel-industry.com%2Fconsultingpress%2Fhome-tourism%2Fevents%2F|||" icon="true" icon_type="icon_lynny" icon_lynny="lynny-arrow-circle-right"][/vc_column][/vc_row]

item.content:encoded: [vc_row css=".vc_custom_1483518977393{margin-bottom: 80px !important;}"][vc_column][volcanno_heading heading_style="custom-heading-03" title="What Our Clients Say About Us" title_size="h3"][vc_column_text]We pay attention to details and quality, good communication and strong customer relationship. Here is what they say about us.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row css=".vc_custom_1483518894830{margin-bottom: 30px !important;}"][vc_column][volcanno_testimonial style="testimonial-style-02" text="``I always love when you upload something new. Your attention to detail, uniqueness and story driven design is a joy to explore. Every pixel is there for a reason, nothing is generic, and it all works great together. Truly an inspiration to look p to, and steal from :)``" author="ColorByt, Web Designer"][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row css=".vc_custom_1483518901138{margin-bottom: 30px !important;}"][vc_column][volcanno_testimonial style="testimonial-style-02" text="``Really happy with the guidance you provided. Our employees are now more aware of their role in information security and management of IT is much efficient now.``" author="Vladimir Mrkela, PIXEL INDUSTRY Ltd."][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row css=".vc_custom_1483518909498{margin-bottom: 30px !important;}"][vc_column][volcanno_testimonial style="testimonial-style-02" text="``Just wanted to thank Consulting Press for providing exceptional Tourism consulting service to our company. Investing in sustainable tourism proves to be really well decision.``" author="Vladimir Mrkela, PIXEL INDUSTRY Ltd." href_text="Scott Rogers, Poleo Digital"][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row css=".vc_custom_1483518920256{margin-bottom: 30px !important;}"][vc_column][volcanno_testimonial style="testimonial-style-02" text="``I don’t purchase themes lightly...this theme is awesome! Lots of nice features. The content manager is very good, it takes a small while just to get used to the format but overall its really good. The support is great and with a fast response, with helpful answers and solutions to my personal preferences. Just buy it, you wont regret it :)``" author="sboyle, Elvyre Retina Ready WordPress Theme" href_text="Scott Rogers, Poleo Digital"][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row css=".vc_custom_1483518927764{margin-bottom: 30px !important;}"][vc_column][volcanno_testimonial style="testimonial-style-02" text="``... The end product is one of the most solid web experiences we have seen on ThemeForest though we are still doing more testing. The functionality, user interface, and customization of features is extremely high end. We keep telling our client that Elvyre is what a ”$20,000 website looks like” – everyone is very psyched about it.....``" author="- DigitalMarketingAssociates, Elvyre Retina Ready WordPress Theme" href_text="Scott Rogers, Poleo Digital"][/vc_column][/vc_row]
